definition.name: Menubar
definition.purpose: Provides a styled menubar root component for building accessible menus.
definition.description: A flexible and accessible menubar root component based on Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Root. It applies custom styling and allows passing additional props and className for further customization.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the menubar root.

visible: A horizontal menubar container with default styling.
enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

when.event: Component re-renders with new props or children.

to.state: Updated menubar with new props or children.

effects: The menubar updates its appearance or content.

definition.visualLayout: A flex row container with gap, border, background, and shadow.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Root and applies custom class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: MenubarMenu
definition.purpose: Provides a styled menu container for the menubar.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Menu, adding a data-slot for styling and accessibility.

visible: A menu container for menubar items.
enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

when.event: Component re-renders with new props or children.

to.state: Updated menu with new props or children.

effects: The menu updates its appearance or content.

definition.name: MenubarGroup
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Group, used to group related menu items for accessibility and styling.

initial.data: Renders a group container for menu items.

visible: A group container for related menu items.
enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

when.event: Component re-renders with new props or children.

to.state: Updated group with new props or children.

effects: The group updates its appearance or content.

definition.visualLayout: A container for grouping menu items.

definition.name: MenubarPortal
definition.purpose: Renders menubar content in a React portal.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Portal, used to render menu content outside the DOM hierarchy for accessibility and layering.

initial.data: Renders a portal for menu content.

visible: A portal container for menu content.
enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

when.event: Component re-renders with new props or children.

to.state: Updated portal with new props or children.

definition.visualLayout: A React portal for menu content.

definition.name: MenubarRadioGroup
definition.purpose: Groups radio items in the menubar for exclusive selection.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.RadioGroup, allowing only one radio item to be selected at a time within the group.

visible: A container for radio menu items.
enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

when.event: Component re-renders with new props or children.

to.state: Updated radio group with new props or children.

effects: The radio group updates its content.

definition.visualLayout: A container for radio menu items.

definition.name: MenubarTrigger
definition.purpose: Acts as a trigger for opening a menubar menu.
definition.description: A styled trigger button for opening a menubar menu, wrapping Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Trigger and applying custom styles.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the trigger.

visible: A trigger button for the menubar.
enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

definition.visualLayout: A styled button or element for opening a menu.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Trigger and applies custom class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: MenubarContent
definition.purpose: Displays the content of a menubar menu.
definition.description: A styled container for the content of a menubar menu, wrapping Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Content and rendered in a portal. Supports alignment and offset props.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the content.

align.description: Alignment of the menu content. Default is 'start'.

sideOffset.description: Offset for the side. Default is 8.

initial.data: Renders the menu content in a portal.

enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

to.state: Menu is open and content is visible.

effects: The menu content is displayed or hidden.

definition.visualLayout: A floating container for menu items, rendered in a portal.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps MenubarPrimitive.Content and MenubarPortal, applies custom class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: MenubarItem
definition.purpose: Represents an individual item in the menubar.
definition.description: A styled menu item for the menubar, supporting 'inset' and 'variant' props for additional styling. Wraps Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Item.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the item.

variant.description: Visual variant of the item. Can be 'default' or 'destructive'.

enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

when.event: Item is clicked, focused, or hovered.

effects: The item responds visually and may trigger an action.

definition.visualLayout: A flex row menu item with optional inset and variant styling.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Item and applies custom class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: MenubarCheckboxItem
definition.purpose: Represents a checkbox item in the menubar.
definition.description: A styled checkbox menu item for the menubar, wrapping Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.CheckboxItem. Displays a check icon when checked.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the checkbox item.

visible: A styled checkbox menu item with optional check icon.
enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

effects: The check icon is shown or hidden, and the checked state changes.

definition.visualLayout: A flex row checkbox menu item with a check icon indicator.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.CheckboxItem and uses CheckIcon from lucide-react.

definition.name: MenubarRadioItem
definition.purpose: Represents a radio item in the menubar.
definition.description: A styled radio menu item for the menubar, wrapping Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.RadioItem. Displays a circle icon when selected.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the radio item.

visible: A styled radio menu item with optional circle icon.
enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

effects: The circle icon is shown, and the selected state changes.

definition.visualLayout: A flex row radio menu item with a circle icon indicator.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.RadioItem and uses CircleIcon from lucide-react.

definition.name: MenubarLabel
definition.purpose: Displays a label within the menubar.
definition.description: A styled label for grouping or describing menu items, wrapping Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Label. Supports optional inset styling.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the label.

initial.data: Renders a label for menu items.

visible: A styled label for menu items.
enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

when.event: Component re-renders with new props or children.

to.state: Updated label with new props or children.

effects: The label updates its appearance or content.

definition.visualLayout: A text label with optional inset styling.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Label and applies custom class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: MenubarSeparator
definition.purpose: Visually separates groups of menu items.
definition.description: A styled separator for dividing groups of menu items, wrapping Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Separator.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the separator.

enabled: All props passed to the component.

definition.visualLayout: A horizontal line with margin and background color.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Separator and applies custom class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: MenubarShortcut
definition.purpose: Displays a keyboard shortcut hint in a menu item.
definition.description: A styled span for displaying keyboard shortcut hints within a menu item.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the shortcut.

visible: A text hint for keyboard shortcuts.
enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

when.event: Component re-renders with new props or children.

to.state: Updated shortcut with new props or children.

effects: The shortcut updates its appearance or content.

definition.visualLayout: A right-aligned text hint in a menu item.
definition.implementationNotes: Renders a styled span for shortcut hints, using the cn utility.

definition.name: MenubarSub
definition.purpose: Provides a submenu container in the menubar.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.Sub, used to create nested submenus within the menubar.

enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

when.event: Component re-renders with new props or children.

to.state: Updated submenu with new props or children.

definition.visualLayout: A container for nested submenu items.

definition.name: MenubarSubTrigger
definition.purpose: Acts as a trigger for opening a submenu in the menubar.
definition.description: A styled trigger for opening a submenu, wrapping Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.SubTrigger. Supports optional inset styling and displays a chevron icon.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the sub trigger.

visible: A styled submenu trigger with chevron icon.
enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

when.description: User interacts with the sub trigger.
when.event: Sub trigger is clicked or focused.

definition.visualLayout: A flex row trigger with chevron icon for opening a submenu.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.SubTrigger and uses ChevronRightIcon from lucide-react. Applies custom class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: MenubarSubContent
definition.purpose: Displays the content of a submenu in the menubar.
definition.description: A styled container for the content of a submenu, wrapping Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.SubContent.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the sub content.

enabled: All props and children passed to the component.

to.state: Submenu is open and content is visible.

effects: The submenu content is displayed or hidden.

definition.visualLayout: A floating container for submenu items.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's MenubarPrimitive.SubContent and applies custom class names using the cn utility.
